title: From Hate
description: Caleb Stone is British, arrogant, protective, domineering and controlling. Francesca Radley is strong, independent and takes no bullshit since she left her dictatorial parents. When Caleb becomes a sponsor of Francesca’s failing High School they do not start off with the greatest relationship.However, Caleb soon realises he needs Francesca for the better of his deteriorating public appearances, knowing Francesca won’t help willingly he digs deep to infiltrate her life and her secrets. But is she the only one with secrets that could be exposed? And what happens when Francesca witnesses something she wasn’t supposed to?The first instalment of a three part story is filled with secrets, lies and sex – which just complicates it all even more! Follow the love-hate relationship that Caleb and Francesca share. The question is - which emotion will win in the long run?
author: Lily Simon
